channel.title: Events on ATFutures
channel.description: Recent content in Events on ATFutures

item.title: WHO Meeting, Paris Feb-March 2018
item.description: We presented our research at the UNESCO premises in Paris as part of a WHO meeting on Tools on the impacts of air pollution and transport on health: WHO work and future developments. Instead of a static ‘powerpoint’ style presentation we presented a series of web pages which set-out the context surrounding and foundations of our ‘Active Transport Toolkit’ (ATT): Data from the Global Burden of Disease (GBD) portal showing the relationship between deaths from road traffic casualties and air polution in France and Ghana.
